title: Physics-Chemistry Screensaver for Microsoft Windows
description:
OFSET&#039;s attempt to address the shortage of physics teaching in schools; 700 MB of open-source science educational material. Do your homework, then it&#039;s worth a science teacher&#039;s time to teach you from there. And share, improve, and give feedback, by all means This version presented as a screensaver for Microsoft Windows; there are hundreds of millions of machines that could run it. If you want the bootable CD, look around inside the &#039;iso&#039;; it&#039;s there. The screensaver takes a while to start; probably best to go for lunch while it starts saving your screen. Be patient ! To end the screensaver, Ctrl-Alt-F and click the X.

More information here http://linuxtracker.org/torrents-details.php?id=3241
Picture here http://linuxtracker.org/uploads/3241.png

Enjoy !
